article_title: BCBS says health insurance plans changing, but still offered in Duncan

article_metadata.author:
Christian Betancourt
The Duncan Banner

og.description: Blue Cross Blue Shield Oklahoma (BCBSOK) representatives say a popular health insurance plan that was available through the Affordable Care Act is no longer offered, but others will be available.
